body_html:
oh, about returning tuples, it actually doesn't construct a tuple with python numbers, but just a tuple with tensors. So there is no overhead / synchronization happening.

If you want to apply the same mask to multiple tensors, then performing the nonzero before is indeed more efficient.

body:
oh, about returning tuples, it actually doesn't construct a tuple with python numbers, but just a tuple with tensors. So there is no overhead / synchronization happening.

If you want to apply the same mask to multiple tensors, then performing the `nonzero` before is indeed more efficient.
